summary:
Immersion through realism. Days are bright, nights are dark. Eye-killing contrast is non-existent and so is bloom, only noticable during the nights for extra cozy lighting.
Check out the screenshots!
descriptionHtml:
It is recommended to backup your latest save files before trying out ENBseries. They should be located in /your documents/my games/skyrim.

This configuration no longer comes with the Realistic Lighting mod.
Is your game crashing at startup? Disable the SMAA (anti aliasing solution) by deleting the d3d9_smaa.dll! Or try disable ENBseries altogether by deleting the d3d9.dll.
----
Recommended mods to-go-with:
HD Cinematic Fire Effects
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2692
Skyrim Flora Overhaul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=141
Realistic Water Textures and Terrain
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=711

----
The approach I have taken is immersion through realism. Days are bright, nights are dark. Eye-killing contrast is non-existent and bloom is not noticeable during the day, only during the night for extra cozy lighting.
[img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/4792/56123307.jpg[/img]
author: maboll - Opethfeldt - Jasmin
